title: What does the DUP deal mean for Northern Ireland?
description: After months of public rows and secret negotiations the largest unionist party in Northern Ireland agreed a deal with the government to restore power-sharing after two years of hiatus. To optimists, the agreement signals the end of years of political turmoil caused by the impact of Brexit on Northern Ireland.

title: John Swinney and Kate Forbes to appear before UK Covid Inquiry
